1999 wasara juli masalayanalta me wenakota awurudu 12yi.layanalge sahodariya thamayi kathlin.wayasa awarudu 6yi.me dennawa balaganna nani kenekta baradila ammayi thaththayi dawasak niwasin pitawenawa.me denna rupawahiniya bala bala inna atharuthura nani gihin thiyanawa poddak nidaganna kiyala.winadi 45kata passe layanal awith nanita kiyanawa nangi husma ganne na kiyala.hodatama bayawuna nani awith balanakota kathlin marila.marana parikshanayen wartha wela thiyenne hiskabala saha asthi badimakata lakwela wagema thawath darunu thuwala 35k kathlinge siruren hoyagaththayi kiyalayi.layanal kiyala thiyenne “mama tiwi eke yana restling muws tikak nangita gahuwa” kiyalayi.kohoma wunath layanalta jiwithanthaya dakwa siradaduwam niyama wenawa.layanal thamayi labalathama pudgalaya jiwithanthaya dakwa siradaduwam niyama wunu.gugal karala me gana oyalata balaganna puluwan
